name: Control is the Key
description:
My first Game Jam game, I wish I had more time to put into it, but it's kinda fun!
Made in 48h for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.
Theme is: Out of Control

Your system admin needs to use his shortcut keys, but the commands are out of control. Control the Ctrl Key to catch the commands before the request timer goes out. Don't let the timer in the background run out either!

use ↑ ↓ → ← to move, and hold Ctrl to draw a line, draw a shape around the letters to catch them.

If you get hit or a letter touches your line while you draw, you lose 5 seconds!

The shape must end near it's starting point!
